summary: The Biking Instruction, Knowledge, and Education Act of 2025 (BIKE Act) aims to amend federal law to allow states to use grant funds for on-bicycle education for elementary and secondary school students. It also mandates the Secretary to revise the Highway Safety Program Guideline No. 14 on Pedestrian and Bicycle Safety, promoting safe bicycling practices and traffic safety education. The Secretary must consult with educators, disseminate new materials, and report to Congress on implementation progress.
